name: Last Breath (Yorsh)
description:
Warning : Can be (a bit) disturbing.

You are being pulled into the deep by some creepy shadow hands. Try to stay alive.

Find oxygen, avoid sharks and walls.

It's a game based more on atmosphere than gameplay, but I hope it's good enough ! Something should happen around 150 meters if you can make it there.

Controls :
  • Left/Right arrows to move side ways.
  • Space + L/R arrow to move faster, but uses oxygen.
  • Space (alone) to speed up your descent.
Patch Note (Post Jam) :

27/04 - Enabled the ability to go full screen on itch and small settings change to try fix a huge pink triangle in the middle of the screen sometimes on Linux.
